name: Sour Jack
description: Sour Jack, one-half Sour Diesel one-half and Jack Herer, takes its name from its parents. It has developed a solid reputation and is highlighted by an intense aroma and profound cerebral effects. After combining the two sativa-dominant strains, we are left with an amazing combination of tropical, sweet flavors that mix with pungent tones of citrus and diesel. The uplifting effects can provide a spark of energy and minimize body fatigue. Sour Jack is a great strain to fight off depression and to help you stay active.
descriptionPlain: Sour Jack, one-half Sour Diesel one-half and Jack Herer, takes its name from its parents. It has developed a solid reputation and is highlighted by an intense aroma and profound cerebral effects. After combining the two sativa-dominant strains, we are left with an amazing combination of tropical, sweet flavors that mix with pungent tones of citrus and diesel. The uplifting effects can provide a spark of energy and minimize body fatigue. Sour Jack is a great strain to fight off depression and to help you stay active.

highlightedReviews.text: Been a while since I've had it but I remember this one being just amazing. One of the best sativa buzzes I've ever had. Energetic and giggly. Tons of fun in groups. A friend who usually finds more paranoia while smoking than anything else said this was "the most enjoyable" strain he had tried. Depression and anxiety are gone on this one. A favorite for me!
Swiss Army knife strain. Excellent, though not maybe not particularly creativity-inducing, strain. No complaints.

articles.title: New Strains Alert: Conspiracy Kush, Starfighter, Sour Jack, Aurora Borealis, and Marionberry Kush
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
Another round of strains have been added to the Leafly Explorer as per your requests! We've highlighted five of our favorites, but there are plenty more to check out here. 
All right, you know what to do with these: indulge, rate, review, repeat!
   1. Conspiracy Kush
Characteristics of Conspiracy Kush:

70% indica
Cross between Obama Kush and Space Queen
Breeder: TGA Genetics
Tangy citrus aroma with a peppery aftertaste
Cerebral activity followed by relaxing effects

   2. Starfighter
Characteristics of Starfighter:

60/40 indica-dominant hybrid
Cross between Alien Tahoe OG and Lemon Alien Dawg
Breeder: Alien Genetics
Sweet citrus aroma
Potently uplifting effects

   3. Sour Jack
Characteristics of Sour Jack:

70% sativa
Cross between Sour Diesel and Jack Herer
Tropical, sweet aroma
Uplifting effects with a spark of energy
May help with fatigue and depression

   4. Aurora Borealis
Characteristics of Aurora Borealis:

75% indica
Cross between Northern Lights #10 with Skunk #1
Sweet, skunky aroma
May help with spasms, pain, and sleeplessness

   5. Marionberry Kush
Characteristics of Marionberry Kush:

60/40 indica-dominant hybrid
Cross between Raspberry Kush and Space Queen
Breeder: TGA Genetics
Passion fruit and raspberry aroma
Uplifting followed by relaxation

growInfo.growNotes:
10-12 weeks flowering
	High THC
	Low CBD
